About Me

Hey Everyone, I am Jay!

Welcome to my blog! Thanks for giving your precious time to this blog of mine. I hope it turns out to be useful to you.

I am an undergrad student at IIITV, currently in my sophomore year. I love coding, writing and reading differant literatures, and travelling. I am the Joint Secretary of Coding Club, IIITV currently. I began coding a bit early in my life, you can read more about my journey with coding here. I like developing websites, but I am also interested in the fields of Machine Learning and AI. I plan on diving deep into those fields later on. To get more updates about this blog, or know more about my life, you can follow me on my social media accounts. Hey everyone! I am Jay Mistry, a sophomore at IIIT Vadodara. I got into coding a bit early in my life, and am loving it since then! I love learning new stuff, and building things that help out me, and others. I believe in building a solution, rather than finding it someplace else. You can know more about me on one of my social handles. Thanks for visiting!
